detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract Qontender (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Qontender.sol#98-221) has payable functions:
	 - Qontender.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Qontender.sol#210-212)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [Qontender](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Qontender.sol#L98-L221) has payable functions:
	 - [Qontender.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Qontender.sol#L210-L212)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

detectors.description: Variable Qontender._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Qontender.sol#104) is not in mixedCase

Qontender.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Qontender.sol#113-120) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 500000000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Qontender.sol#117)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- Qontender.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Qontender.sol#126-128)
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Qontender.sol#43)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Qontender.sol#44)
	- Qontender.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Qontender.sol#134-136)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Qontender.sol#45)
	- Qontender.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Qontender.sol#189-191)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Qontender.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Qontender.sol#144-149)
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Qontender.sol#46)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Qontender.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Qontender.sol#160-164)
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Qontender.sol#47)

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- Owned.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Qontender.sol#82-84)

acceptOwnership() should be declared external:
	- Owned.acceptOwnership() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Qontender.sol#85-90)
